site_name: Blacks Bridge, Main Road, Raphael Park
description:
Extending the Parapet Safety Railing works on the Black Bridge
Blacks bridge currently has a barrier wall left and right hand side. On the canal side of the barrier wall there is a small section of existing railings,on the left and right hand side.The extention of work would to be supply and fix safety rails to be fixed on top of the barrier wall extending the railings would to be match existing in specification and height.To supply and fit railings on canal barrier walls left hand and right hand side up to where the arch starts . Left hand side total run 9.1m including extension of 2.4m. Right hand side total run 9.1m including extension of 6.7m. Railings to match existing ,50x12 top and bottom rails and 20mm square infills with a 170mm rail head. Post to be chem fixed into top of the barrier wall. Safety railing need to be installed (to be extended)where the parapet wall height is up to 1200mm.
